answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hi Margretta, 
You'll need to contact ICMA-RC for information on your retirement account. (ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations.) You can visit their website at www.icma-rc.org, or call 1-800-669-7400.

author: Margretta Perry
text: I am planning to retire in August, receiving my first benefit payment in September. We are buying a house and cannot close on the loan without an estimate of benefits for the loan company. How do I access this information in a hurry?
title: Retirement Benefits
